objects.text: • EVER-SOFT GRIP • SPACEWALK SOLE • BREATHABLE DESIGN

product_details.name: X Lows CORTADO
product_details.description:
- The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios.
- Like its namesake Spanish coffee, the pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of rich, crema-topped espresso, same as a baristas pour.Bold yet smooth, the Cortado is a daily essential brewed to perfection. - Ever-soft and ever-snug grip- Roomy toe box lets our broad Indian toes breathe.- Irresistible comfort, thanks to SpaceWalk, our signature 3-layered sole system.
- SpaceWalk is light, airy, and cloud-like, and is named so for all the right reasons.
- What you'll be stepping into is a long-lasting insole placed on top of an ultra-cushioned sheet of foam found in running shoes.
- The sheet is then housed inside a light-weight rubber outsole for sturdiness, making this a go-to choice for everything from morning walks to house party nights.
- SpaceWalks grooves and textures let you land on your feet in style with zero slip and max abrasion resistance.
- Materials:Upper: Canvas with Microfiber UnderlayFootbed: Synthetic LeatherSole: Rubber, EVA

banner_details:
The banner features a clean, modern layout with a central highlight on a sneaker product image (`product_image`), enclosed within a circular dotted and solid border element. The background employs a soft radial gradient transitioning from light beige to a warm taupe tone. The topmost bold heading (`heading`) uses a condensed display font in a rich chocolate brown color, followed by a slightly lighter subheading text (`subheading`) highlighting product nature. The price (`price`) is presented inside a circular accent with a linear gradient in tan tones, offering visual contrast. At the bottom, concise features are listed (`description`) in a horizontal line with decorative bullets, and a dark brown rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) featuring white uppercase text (`cta`). The use of radial and linear gradients, dotted strokes and radial balance adds visual interest while keeping focus on the shoe.

**Color Palette**:
- Background Gradient Start: `#F8F4EC` (light beige)
- Background Gradient End: `#E1D9CC` (warm taupe)
- Accent Gradient Start: `#9B7A5A` (light tan brown)
- Accent Gradient End: `#6D4C33` (dark chocolate brown)
- Text Primary: `#6D4C33`
- Subheading Text: `#8B5A2B`
- Price Text: `#FFFFFF`
- Button Background: `#6D4C33`
- Button Text: `#FFFFFF`
- Circle Fill (Product BG): `#FFF8F0`
product_color: The product image showcases a sneaker that features a soft, neutral color palette optimized for natural and earthy-themed advertisement banners. The upper is primarily an off-white cream color (#F5F1E6), offering a clean, versatile base. Accentuating this are deep mocha brown laces and trimming (#6B4C3B), adding warmth and a grounded tone. The sole is a light beige/tan shade (#E6DCCD), harmonizing with the upper while distinguishing itself subtly. The standout element is the white star emblem (#FFFFFF) outlined in the same deep brown, which adds contrast without overwhelming the design. These colors blend seamlessly while each element remains highlighted through sharp borders and material texture contrasts.
